item.title: Bela add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Bela add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The Guide says there is an art to flying", said Ford, "or rather a knack. The knack lies in learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Bela add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Bela add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Bela add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Bela add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Bela add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Bela add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Everybody can be great...because anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Bela add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Bela add a quote by Anatole France
item.description: "Until one has loved an animal, a part of one's soul remains unawakened." -- Anatole France

item.title: Bela add a quote by Anatole France
item.description: "Never lend books, for no one ever returns them; the only books I have in my library are books that other folks have lent me." -- Anatole France
